description: The PAZAR database unites independently created and maintained data collections of transcription factor and regulatory sequence annotation. It provides information on the sequence and target of individual transcription factors.
name: Pazar Transcription Factor

resources.description: Pazar Transcription Factor at University of British Columbia

institution.description: The Centre for Molecular Medicine and Therapeutics is dedicated to unravelling and solving the many genetic questions surrounding human illness and well-being, and finding novel approaches to treatment and prevention that can overcome the causes of illness.
institution.name: Centre for Molecular Medicine and Therapeutics, University of British Columbia, Vancouver

resources.name: Pazar Transcription Factor at University of British Columbia
